translations: 芽菜；豆芽菜；球芽甘蓝（sprout 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: When eating hotpot, mung bean sprouts can be instant boiled in the dish.
sentences.translation: 吃火锅的时候， 绿豆芽可以立刻在锅里煮熟。

sentences.sentence: Three more new sprouts have grown around Buddy!
sentences.translation: 巴迪周围又长出了三颗新芽！

sentences.sentence: The leaves on the new sprouts have grown a bit.
